news_header: Israel mourns four hostages returned by Hamas amid ongoing conflict and unresolved Palestinian casualties.
news_original_title: Return of bodies marks day of anguish for Israel
news_text: On a grim winter day, Israel faced the return of four deceased hostages held by Hamas. The handover was politically charged, highlighting the ongoing conflict and the pain of families affected. While Israelis mourned, Palestinians expressed anger over unreturned bodies of their own. The situation remains tense as both sides grapple with loss and unresolved issues.
